attributes.action: Reinstate the triple lock, for state pensioners
attributes.additional_details: State pensioners live on a low income. The increased in pensions this year was not enough to keep the same monetary value to the previous year. So we would like the government to reintroduce the triple lock for 2023
attributes.background: For the government to keep its 2019 manifesto pledge on the triple lock for state pensioners

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625622
